5193.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|105|96$قِيلَ|it is said|75|115|97$لَهُمْ|to them,|77|117|98$تَعَالَوْاْ|`Come,|76|116|2945$يَسْتَغْفِرْ|will ask forgiveness|147|187|16949$لَكُمْ|for you|67|87|207$رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ|(the) Messenger of Allah.`|196|203|4668$لَوَّوْاْ|They turn aside|124|138|16950$رُءُوسَهُمْ|their heads|104|118|10399$وَرَأَيْتَهُمْ|and you see them|139|153|16951$يَصُدُّونَ|turning away|106|113|4123$وَهُم|while they|88|324|256$مُّسْتَكْبِرُونَ|(are) arrogant.|126|362|9924$

5194.verse: سَوَآءٌ|(It) is same|97|112|60$عَلَيْهِمْ|for them|76|107|22$أَسْتَغْفَرْتَ|whether you ask forgiveness|210|241|16952$لَهُمْ|for them|76|107|98$أَمْ|or|38|69|62$لَمْ|(do) not|75|90|63$تَسْتَغْفِرْ|ask forgiveness|122|132|7780$لَهُمْ|for them.|81|102|98$لَن|Never|58|79|524$يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ|will Allah forgive|126|147|7782$لَهُمْ‌ۚ|[to] them.|89|110|98$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|91|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|64|184$لَا|(does) not|90|130|30$يَهْدِى|guide|69|150|1270$ٱلْقَوْمَ|the people,|95|176|2316$ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ|the defiantly disobedient.|189|229|277$

5195.verse: هُمُ|They|53|64|56$ٱلَّذِينَ|(are) those who|127|150|20$يَقُولُونَ|say,|88|111|753$لَا|`(Do) not|84|107|30$تُنفِقُواْ|spend|73|96|2449$عَلَىٰ|on|63|86|52$مَنْ|(those) who|101|112|76$عِندَ|(are) with|86|100|521$رَسُولِ|(the) Messenger|129|158|7787$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|110|2$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|93|526$يَنفَضُّواْ‌ۗ|they disband.`|118|147|16953$وَلِلَّهِ|And for Allah|104|118|1070$خَزَآئِنُ|(are the) treasures|147|153|5610$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|144|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth,|116|128|352$وَلَـٰكِنَّ|but|78|90|952$ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ|the hypocrites|116|128|4122$لَا|(do) not|75|81|30$يَفْقَهُونَ|understand.|99|99|4223$

5196.verse: يَقُولُونَ|They say,|88|94|753$لَئِن|`If|52|64|4795$رَّجَعْنَآ|we return|84|96|16954$إِلَى|to|53|65|118$ٱلْمَدِينَةِ|Al-Madinah,|98|110|6709$لَيُخْرِجَنَّ|surely, will expel|128|140|16955$ٱلْأَعَزُّ|the more honorable|148|154|16956$مِنْهَا|from it|63|81|246$ٱلْأَذَلَّ‌ۚ|the more humble.`|143|178|16957$وَلِلَّهِ|But for Allah|101|136|1070$ٱلْعِزَّةُ|(is) the honor|111|146|1811$وَلِرَسُولِهِۦ|and for His Messenger|166|184|16958$وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|and for the believers,|162|182|9657$وَلَـٰكِنَّ|but|78|118|952$ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ|the hypocrites|116|156|4122$لَا|(do) not|75|116|30$يَعْلَمُونَ|know.|92|112|115$

5197.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ|O you who believe!|197|206|7177$لَا|(Let) not|80|97|30$تُلْهِكُمْ|divert you|87|104|16959$أَمْوَٲلُكُمْ|your wealth|98|115|7227$وَلَآ|and not|71|88|25$أَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ|your children|105|114|14294$عَن|from|54|63|1105$ذِكْرِ|(the) remembrance|147|166|5228$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|(of) Allah.|86|104|2$وَمَن|And whoever|106|124|1012$يَفْعَلْ|does|65|84|2038$ذَٲلِكَ|that,|64|82|28$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those|92|101|777$هُمُ|[they]|62|310|56$ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ|(are) the losers.|128|376|287$

5193.verse: And when it is said to them, "Come, the Messenger of Allah will ask forgiveness for you," they turn their heads aside and you see them evading while they are arrogant.

5194.verse: It is all the same for them whether you ask forgiveness for them or do not ask forgiveness for them; never will Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.

5195.verse: They are the ones who say, "Do not spend on those who are with the Messenger of Allah until they disband." And to Allah belongs the depositories of the heavens and the earth, but the hypocrites do not understand.

5196.verse: They say, "If we return to al-Madinah, the more honored [for power] will surely expel therefrom the more humble." And to Allah belongs [all] honor, and to His Messenger, and to the believers, but the hypocrites do not know.

5197.verse: O you who have believed, let not your wealth and your children divert you from remembrance of Allah. And whoever does that - then those are the losers.

5198.verse: And spend [in the way of Allah] from what We have provided you before death approaches one of you and he says, "My Lord, if only You would delay me for a brief term so I would give charity and be among the righteous."

5199.verse: But never will Allah delay a soul when its time has come. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
